#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
int array[1000];
int main()
{
	int test;
	scanf("%d",&test);
	while(test--)
	{
		int n;
		int r;
		scanf("%d%d",&n,&r);
		r = n-r<r?n-r:r;
		long long val = 1;
		int count=r-1;
		for(int i=2;i<=r;i++)
			array[i-2] = 1;
		for(int i=0;i<r;i++)
		{
			val *= n-i;
			for(int j=0;j<=r-2 && count;j++)
			{
				if(array[j])
				{
					if(val%(j+2)==0)
					{
						val = val/(j+2);
						array[j]--;
						count--;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		printf("%lld\n",val);
	}
}
